text: This game was launched on Kickstarter a few weeks ago along with a demo and music samples. I really like this theme and its different sections, it's a single loop. What we have here is a Metroidvania with heavy emphasis on combat inspired by Devil May Cry. Having completed the demo, I can definitely see the potential with the different combos switching between normal, charge and magical attacks. The graphics and music seem to be in good hands, and as expected from an alpha build the gameplay will need some tweaks here and there. For those curious, I added a link to the project in the description.
author: SupraDarky
